metadata.description: Spells that gather information about animals and animal products

spells.name: Speak with Animals
spells.description: Allows the caster to understand and communicate with any natural animal. The animals respond according to their intelligence and nature.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (communicate with animals), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Hearing, +1 Mentem requisite

spells.name: Sense the Nature of the Beast
spells.description: Reveals the basic nature of an animal - its species, health, temperament, and any unusual characteristics or magical influences.

spells.name: Track the Wild Beast
spells.description: Grants supernatural tracking ability, allowing the caster to follow an animal's trail even over difficult terrain or after considerable time.

spells.name: Eyes of the Cat
spells.description: Grants the ability to see in near-total darkness like a cat. The caster's eyes may glow faintly in the dark.

spells.name: Sense the Emotions of the Beast
spells.description: Allows the caster to sense the emotions and basic thoughts of an animal. Reveals fear, aggression, contentment, or other emotional states.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (read animal mind), +1 Eye, +1 Concentration, +1 Mentem requisite

spells.name: Call of the Wild Hunt
spells.description: Allows the caster to hear and understand the calls, howls, and sounds made by wild animals across great distances.

spells.name: Detect the Shapechanger
spells.description: Reveals if a person or animal is actually a shapechanger, were-creature, or someone magically transformed into animal form.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (detect transformation), +1 Eye, +1 Concentration, +1 Corpus requisite

spells.name: Nose of the Hound
spells.description: Grants an exceptionally keen sense of smell, allowing the caster to track by scent, identify individuals, and detect hidden things.

spells.name: Speech of the Forest Folk
spells.description: Allows communication with magical animals and beasts of legend. The caster can speak with dragons, unicorns, and other intelligent magical creatures.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (communicate with magical animals), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Hearing, +1 Mentem requisite

spells.name: Eyes of the Eagle
spells.description: Grants incredibly sharp eyesight, allowing the caster to see fine details at great distances and spot movement from far away.

spells.name: Wisdom of the Ancient Beast
spells.description: Allows the caster to access the memories and knowledge of an old animal, learning about events the creature has witnessed over its lifetime.
